Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Input::ActionAction maps a button to a behavior
Ball
Entity::BallFactory
CSingleton< T >The CSingleton class is a template class for creating singleton objects
Entity::EntityCreationFailed
Entity::EntityDoesntExist
Entity::EntityFactoryBase class for all factories in the system. Provides a loadEntity method given an XML filename of the entity
Entity::EntityInfoEntityInfo is a data structure for storing the information about an entity loaded in by EntityManager from an XML file
EntityManagerEntityManager provides an easy and organized way of retrieving entities that were defined via an XML file. It loads in the given XML file for the global defintion of entities. Given an entity string name, it will then provide an instantiation of an WorldEntity and keep track of global IDs and will keep track of the deletion of the WorldEntity
Input::InputDeviceInputDevice is the base class for all devices added to the InputManager
Input::InputDeviceInitInputDeviceInit should be inherited from if a new device needs to be added, should contain initialiation information
InputManagerInputManager encapsulates all workings of the InputSystem
Input::KeyboardKeyboard is a specialization of the InputDevice provided by the InputManager by default
Input::KeyboardInitDefault Irrilicht keyboard provided
LevelHolds everything within a specific level. It loads in all the world entities and updates them. Each level has its own xml file
LevelManagerLevelManager organizes the transition of levels. It The current level should be retrieved from LevelManager. It loads in the given XML file for the global defintion of levels. It tells the entitymanager how to initialize
Entity::LoaderLoader is used by EntityManager. It keeps track of the factories for each type. Types are currently hard coded

Physics::WorldEntityCollisionCallbackClass containing the callback method for the Physics system. This derived class maintains the two material names and the list of observing entity scripts
